remarks: Extend an infinite group sum by padding outside with zeroes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 25-Jul-2019.)
statement:
tsmsres.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
tsmsres.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
tsmsres.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
tsmsres.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. TopSp ) $.
tsmsres.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
tsmsres.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
tsmsres.s $e |- ( ph -> ( F supp .0. ) C_ W ) $.
tsmsres $p |- ( ph -> ( G tsums ( F |` W ) ) = ( G tsums F ) ) $.
